text: Matteo Schablas (14 March 2005 in Aichach, Germany) is an Austrian football player. He playes for FC Liefering as defender in the 2nd Austrian League. ==Career == Schablas began his career at TSV Inchenhofen. He moved to FC Augsburg for the 2014/15 season. For the 2015/16 season he went to the youth team of FC Bayern Munich. From the 2021/22 season he was part of the squad for the U-19 team, for which he also played in the UEFA Youth League in the 2022/23 season. For the 2023/24 season, Schablas moved to the Austrian second division club FC Liefering. He made his debut in the second division 0 28 July 2023 when he came on as a substitute for Moussa Kounfolo Yeo in the 80th minute against FC Dornbirn 1913 on the first day of that season. Transfermarkt.at Match report (German) ==National team== Schablas made his debut for the Austrian U-18 team against Sweden in September 2022. ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Liefering players Category:Austrian football defenders
title: Matteo Schablas
